title: Appeal to Sri Lankan Tamils not to be misled again by Pro – LTTE TNA
content: By Shenali Waduge What do Sambanthan, Premachandran, Senathirajah and Sreetharan all have in common? Apart from being partners of an unregistered alliance called the Tamil National Alliance, they are all former mouthpieces of the separatist agenda and they continue to be the obstacle to allowing people to start life afresh as that would mean an…
